god awful video quality. So many artifacts I might as well be in king tut's tomb, but the black levels are so overblown I think I might be in Detroit.

Good Comments: Great quality, subbing above par. KAA does a good job, again.

Bad Comments: Good quality all around. Do wish you could have subbed the Spanish bits though. :3

Good Comments: they rok
nice and good subbs

Good Comments: KAA was the only group subbing this when it first came, so that's who I had to go with. Good thing they did a great job regardless.
Simply the translation was fluid and, as far as I could see, free of typos. They put a lot of effort into type setting and even used italics to show stress on certain words.
Excellent quality and corrected DVD subs.
epic subs! DVD subs is the win!
HQ DVD Rips, as always.
They subbed Gunbuster the best and know what they're doing through and through.
Good subbing
good
Bad Comments: Great subs, great video quality, no problems at all

I think KAA is probably the only choice out there as far as fan subbing for this series goes so it's not like you have a choice.  Anyways, their translations were pretty confusing and really made the story a lot more complicated than it is.
KAA did a good job on the subs although there were often typos and grammatical mistakes.
Good subs, although they chose to translate some things slightly different to what they did in Gunbuster. Accurate enough for viewing pleasure!

Good Comments: KAA's usual great A/V quality and styled softsubs. Bitrate might be a bit high, but the quality is unmatched. Good stuff.
Good subs, no problems in timing, proper grammar.
KickAssAnime. Pretty self explanatory. :)
Very very good subs. No typos and good grammar. As good as subs for this series can get.
good quality and easily accessible.
excellent

Non invasive and easy to read subs.
